homeContent.title: Mr. Mostafa Jamal Mohiuddin
homeContent.company: Khoshroz Kitab Mahal, Magura Group And NDC Auto brick
homeContent.desc: In addition to his involvement in the publication industry, Mr. Jamal is also involved in various other businesses, such as Magura Paper Mills Ltd, Bangladesh Monospool Paper Manufacturing Company Ltd, and Paper Processing & Packaging Ltd. He has also established a sole proprietorship business called Jatiya Mudran.
